page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: Our area is situated just South-East of Croydon. It is a nice area to live in as there is alot of open park and grassland. All these Buses pass through the area: 130,130b,64,234,12a and Tillingbourne. Housing:- The accomodation in the area is mainly residential with several large estates. 1)New Addington:- Mainly council owned building began in the 1930's and continued until the 1960's. 2) Forestdale:- Private residential housing built during the 1960's-70's. 3) Addington Village:- Wholly residential, modern housing built during the 1950's and 60's. Industry:- There is very little industry in the area, although there are two small factory estates. One in New Addington, the other in Coney Hall.
